name: Flying
description: the airborne adventurer disguised as a drone, soaring through the skieswith purr-fectly unpredictable flight patterns.

name: Sleepy
description: The master of catnaps - can fall asleep anywhere at any time.

name: Sad
description: This cat is so sad that it meows in minor key. It spends its days staring out the window, contemplating the futility of chasing mice.

name: Ninja
description: executing a mind-bending 360 back-flip to dodge an unexpected attack. Simply a masterpiece!

name: Yoga Guru
description: Practicing cat yoga poses with unmatched flexibility and zen vibes.

name: SnackSneak
description: The notorious food bandit of the feline world. While its unsuspecting owner was diligently filling up the cat feeder, MischiefCat saw an opportunity for a five-star feast. It executed a purrfect heist, snatching kibbles like a culinary cat burglar.

name: Drama Queen
description: This cat transform the simple act of being picked up into a melodramatic masterpiece, leaving no doubt that in the world of cat theatrics, every moment is a stage and every pick-up is an Oscar-worthy performance

name: Smarty Pants
description: A cat genius solving complex puzzles and outsmarting everyone.

name: Kisser
description: the lovable cinematographer cat, steals the show as it plants a furry smooch on the lens

name: Skydiver
description: This cat takes urban exploration to new extremes with a building-to-building skydive, proving that this fearless feline has both whiskers and courage in abundance
